posts.message:
7 Things Don't Use It If You Are Building a Trial Desktop App.

1- Don't Encrypt/Decrypt Using Base64 Or Cipher Only (Mix Them) 
2- Don't Check The Equality Of The License Using If (Use Switch)
3- Don't Make The Check Of License Offline (Use API)
4- Don't Send/Receive Plain Text Over The API Calls (Encrypt All)
5- Don't Store The License Info On The Machine (Store It Online)
6- Don't Calculate The Trial Period Based On User Machine (Use The Server Time)
7- Don't Publish Your App Directly After The Final Build (Obfuscate It)

• This Based On Personal Experience Throw The Last Week While Am Trying To Reset The Trial Period Of Some Visual Studio Extensions , And Failed ! :D
